sources.title: Paroled To Die (1938) BOB STEELE
sources.description:
Stars: Bob Steele, Kathleen Eliot, Karl Hackett 
 Director: Sam Newfield

 Meline is taking money from his own bank to drill an oil well. When he finds Doug Redfern's bandana, he has his gang rob his bank and uses the bandana to frame Doug. When Doug is convicted but immediately paroled, Meline has another plan that he thinks will put him away permanently.

metadata.Plot: Meline is taking money from his own bank to drill an oil well. When he finds Doug Redfern's bandana, he has his gang rob his bank and uses the bandana to frame Doug. When Doug is convicted but immediately paroled, Meline has another plan that he thinks will put him away permanently.
metadata.Writer: Harry F. Olmsted, George H. Plympton
metadata.Actors: Bob Steele, Kathleen Eliot, Karl Hackett
